info.name: EUDAT B2SHARE bridge
info.summary: The B2SHARE bridge transfers files from B2DROP to B2SHARE
info.description: This application enables B2DROP users to publish data to a external publishing service, such as B2SHARE. Because B2DROP is based on Nextcloud, this plugin will work with general Nextcloud servers. If enabled, a icon is added to the file-list, that triggers a third party file transfer from the B2DROP server to a service like B2SHARE. Because this upload is delayed and happening in the background, there is a status page available that is holding additional information.
info.author: EUDAT
